text_logic_form: Point $A$ is the midpoint of one of the legs of the trapezoid $RSTV$.
Point $B$ is the midpoint of the other leg of the trapezoid $RSTV$.
Find the length of the line $VT$.

diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $RC$ is $26$ units.
The length of the line $AB$ is $15$ units.
Point $A$ lies on the line connecting points $V$ and $R$.
Point $B$ lies on the line connecting points $T$ and $C$.
